name: WipEout 2048
description:
Hyper-Velocity Racing Powered by PlayStation®Vita

Experience the thrill and speed of antigravity racing with PS Vita system's enhanced controls, including motion active tilt and touch interface. WipEout® 2048 also supports Cross Play between PS Vita and PS3™ players. It's a never-ending battle to stay atop the online leaderboards.

• Touch and tilt to victory — tilt to steer, use rear touch to accelerate and front touch to fire weapons
• Multiplayer Cross Play — race with up to 8 players on either PS Vita or PS3™ systems
• Comprehensive campaign and online modes



Online Pass code may be redeemed once and becomes associated with the PlayStation®Network account used to redeem it. Online Pass access rights cannot be transferred once the voucher is redeemed. Online Pass codes cannot be returned for cash or credit.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service, this item's use restrictions, and other applicable terms located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time fee for downloads to up to two systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
